about.part1: Chikachev Andrei Vasilievich, was born in 27 April 1967, at p. Khatyn-Sysy, Leninsky district, Yakut ASSR. In the period from 3 to 7 classes Suntarsky attended art school. After Suntarsky High School in 1982 he entered the Yakut art school. In 1986 he enrolled in the Far East Institute of the Arts at the Faculty of Painting - Workshop Litvinova S.A. After the first course served in the Soviet Army. After the service he continued his studies at the institute. While studying at the institute participated in the youth exhibitions. Since 1998. - Member of the Russian Artists' Union. Is the winner of the award "Best product of the Year", winner of the Vladimir Vasiliev Award "Spring in December,"Audience Choice Award", a special prize of "TURKSOY", awarded with "spiritual. Traditions. Skill "Russian Union of Artists. Since 1996. engaged in creative activity, he was secretary of the commission on award of the State Prize of the RS (Y) them. PA Oiunsky with 2015g.-member Commission on awarding the State Prize of the RS (Y) named P.A.Oyunskogo.
about.part2: In 2001 he was awarded the title "Honored Worker of Arts of RS (Y)", in 2013, the winner of Gos.premii of Sakha (Yakutia) to them. P.A.Oyunskogo.
about.part3: Creative works are in the National Art Museum of the RS (Y), in galleries and private collections in the USA, UK, Canada, South Korea, Germany and Japan.
about.part5: 1992 - Town youth exhibition, dedicated to a Town Day, Vladivostok
about.part6: 1996 - Female Portrait exhibition, dedicated to the international Women's Day
about.part12: 1999 - Contest exhibition "ArtSakha Modern", a winner of the award "Best work", "People’s Choice Award", Yakutsk
about.part13: 2000 - Contest exhibition "ArtSakha Modern", "People’s Choice Award", Yakutsk
about.part14: 2002 - traveling exhibition "The Art of the Land of Olonkho". Days of Yakutia in Moscow
about.part18: 2004 - Art exhibition, dedicated to anniversary of Yakutsk
about.part19: 2005 - Art exhibition, dedicated to the 60th anniversary of the Victory, Yakutsk
about.part20: 2005 - "Fine Arts of Yakutia" exhibition, St. Petersburg
about.part21: 2005 - The Ethno-Art "Straight Line" festival in Moscow
about.part22: 2006 - 9th International Creative Workshop of Artists of the countries - members of TURKSOY, Turkey
about.part23: 2006 - Exhibition dedicated to the 65th anniversary of the Yakut Union of Artists, Yakutsk
about.part24: 2007 - Exhibition "From Olonkho To a New Reality", Moscow
about.part29: 2009 - "ARTnavigation - Contemporary Graphics and Painting of Yakut Artists" exhibition in Gdansk, Poland
about.part30: 2010 - Exhibition dedicated to the 65th anniversary of the Victory, National Museum of Fine Arts, Yakutsk
about.part31: 2010 - "Parallels of Poland and Yakutia", North-Eastern Federal University Gallery, Yakutsk
about.part33: 2011 - Republican exhibition, dedicated to the 70th anniversary of the Yakut Union of Artists, Yakutsk
about.part34: 2011 - Exhibition in Bezpala Brown gallery of Toronto, Canada
about.part36: 2012 - Solo exhibition "Kun Diono" in Museum-estate of Leo Tolstoy "Yasnaya Polyana"
about.part37: 2012 - Anniversary exhibition, dedicated to the 380th anniversary of accession of Yakutia to Russia, Moscow
about.part40: 2013 - XVI International Plein Air artists TURKSOY countries in Eskishehir, Turkey
about.part43: 2014 - Solo exhibition "Kun Diono", Gualala Arts Center, California, USA
about.part44: 2015 - participation (exhibition) in the Russian-Chinese Expo Harbin, China
about.part45: 2015 - Regional exhibition "Far East and Siberia", Krasnoyarsk
about.part46: 2016 - Exhibition "Painter and Time" National Art Museum Republic Sakha (Yakutia) Hall, Yakutsk
about.part47: 2016 - Participation in the 19th International open-air of artists of TÜRKSOY, Malatya Turkey
about.part48: 2017 - Republican exhibition "To You, my city, I dedicate!" to the 385th anniversary of Yakutsk
about.part49: 2017 - Personal exhibition "OTTOKU OLUK ALGWHA" Yakutsk, Nyurba, Suntar
about.part50: 2018 - Republican exhibition of artists of Yakutia "Spring" Yakutsk
about.part52: 2019 - Republican exhibition of artists of Yakutia "Spring" Yakutsk
about.part53: 2020 - IV Interregional Exhibition "Ural, Siberia, Far East", Chelyabinsk
about.part54: 2021 - exhibition "From Olonkho to the space of creativity" within the framework of the days of Yakutia in the Republic of Tatarstan, Kazan
about.part55: 2021 - All-Russian art exhibition "Unification. 2021", dedicated to. 800th anniversary of Nizhny Novgorod
about.part56: 2021 - Republican anniversary exhibition "Time of Art. Artists of Yakutia»
about.part57: 2022 - Republican art exhibition "Oh yes, food! Aska aikhal!" "Art-Citym" CX RS (Y), Yakutsk
about.part58: 2022 - Interregional exhibition project "Cultural Diversity of the Far East", Vladivostok
about.part59: 2022 - Republican art exhibition "The bright image of the mother", Yakutsk
about.part60: 2022 - Participation in the Republican exhibition "Living Arctic", Yakutsk
about.part61: 2023 - Mobile exhibition of the Union of Artists of Yakutia "Land of Olonkho"
about.part62: 2023 - Mobile exhibition of the Union of Artists of Yakutia "Contemporary Art of the Republic of Sakha-Yakutia" as part of the celebration of Russia Day in Pokrovsk
